parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided text.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any specific parliamentary candidate by name or any other identifying information.  The post focuses on waste management infrastructure in Ploiești.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The content discusses a public issue (waste management) relevant to the residents of Ploiești.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post is to inform the public about the state of waste management infrastructure in Ploiești and potential improvements. There is no discernible attempt to influence voters in favor of or against any candidate.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post presents information about a local issue in a factual manner, similar to a news report or citizen journalism piece. It describes the current situation, potential improvements, and associated costs.  While it expresses an opinion on the need for improvement, it does not advocate for or against any specific candidate or party.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>True. The post expresses Mihai Polițeanu's personal opinion on the need for improved waste management in Ploiești. This opinion is presented in the context of a public service announcement rather than an electoral campaign.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>3785882985075754</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, while published by a person who is also a political figure, does not constitute electoral propaganda.  The content focuses on a local issue (waste management) and does not mention any parliamentary candidates or parties. The post's objective appears to be informative rather than persuasive in relation to the parliamentary elections. The use of a paid Facebook advertisement does not automatically qualify it as electoral propaganda; the content itself must meet the criteria outlined in Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.  This post does not meet those criteria.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
